channel.title: ~~ how to change xp hen attacking npc's (atleast look)~~
channel.description: i need to know how to change xp hen attacking npc's becuase everytime i attk an npc... the xp gives 4 but i look in player.java and cant find.. please post how to please

item.title: ~~ how to change xp hen attacking npc's (atleast look)~~
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Ewa, by looking at your sig, it made me realize, it doesn’t take a genius to stop SYI. It’s really easy, just everyone is accustomed to C+P tutorials.[/off-topic]

Honestly, you shouldn’t post if you can’t help them out. They could be computer-illiterate, Java-illiterate etc. That’s how you crush someone’s confidence when they try making a server, which won’t be good, because no servers are “good”. By laughing at their mistakes, it lowers their confidence at trying to make a server.

Read full topic
item.source: ~~ how to change xp hen attacking npc's (atleast look)~~

item.title: ~~ how to change xp hen attacking npc's (atleast look)~~
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Search in your client.java for 4 * hitDiff or something close to that, then change all of them. It’s in your attacknpc() method, I’m sure of it.

Read full topic
